name: retrylike
description:
After crashing on an alien world, you have to find your way back to your space ship to get home. When you die, the world is  reset, but your place in it isn't.

Use WASD to move and arrow keys to shoot. R hard-resets the game from the very beginning.

I created all the assets using Charm's SoftDecay GB palette, available to download free from Lospec.
